website_summaries.verdict: A heavy-duty tool capable of tackling most tough jobs, though the chuck doesn't quite measure up to the performance of higher-end models.
pros: Drills precise holes, even at angles
Price is impressive for its class
cons: While some users like the Quick Change chuck system, others find it ineffective, resulting in a "loose" fit

customer_reviews.title: Chuck broke easily
customer_reviews.text: After a few hours of use the chuck broke. And of course square trade warranty only covers electrical damage so that was a waste of $20 on them.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Can't say much bad about this drill. Some poor reviews made me nervous but a $2500 drill wasn't in the budget. Not a precision machine but is way tighter than I thought. Warned my guys after reading reviews saying it will start without the mag on but they say it won't. I used it and it is really a nice little drill.
customer_reviews.author: jesse james joslin

customer_reviews.title: dewalt magnetic drill 2 inch works well
customer_reviews.text: EZ to use right out of the box. 30 mm annular cutter made a perfect hole in one inch steel plate first try in about one minute. There is a slight wobble to the chuck so if triple digit precision is needed this might not be the magnetic drill for you. Otherwise it is a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: carpet guy

customer_reviews.title: This bad boy is all you need.
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a mag drill that held good, handled good size bits and was smooth operating. This bad boy is all that and more. It is very stable and has a tight, smooth travel with plenty of power. I can't imagine why anyone would need to spend twice as much for a red or blue colored drill because this one does everything I will ever need. BTW....I've used the others and I see no difference in hole quality and overall operation. The 2 speed motor is a definite plus, also, to slow down for larger drill bits.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Good for what it's meant for...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a DeWalt guy, and this is a nice drill, well made and capable, but the quick-change chuck has vertical play. Normally that play does not cause any trouble unless drilling soft material like thick aluminum. It grabbed, overloaded and stopped. Great for steel though. Has 2" dia and deep capacity!
customer_reviews.author: sandi norman

customer_reviews.title: Tough drill to beat.
customer_reviews.text: We were changing the suspension of a dump truck and had to drill 26 holes through the double frame chassis, (sideways). This drill was perfect. Not one problem. Perfectly straight holes.
customer_reviews.author: Raj

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Got exactly what I was expecting from a Dewalt tool - not the most high-end model you can get but a tough tool that got the job I needed done without any issues at all
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Greene

customer_reviews.title: Best magnetic drill for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great magnetic drill. The magnet is strong, setup is a breeze and the two speed function is a definite plus. No issues with bit walking as with other reviews. Very glad I decided on this one and not some cheap imitation.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t be happier with this drill! I am a concrete and snowplow contractor. This past month I build a new plow rig out of a semi day cab. There were over 30 holes drilled in various pieces of steel from 1/2” to 1” in steel thicknesses from 3/8” to 1”. The man hours this drill saves payed for itself building one truck. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin III

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quick Change chuck system
customer_reviews.text: Drill is good and solid but Quick Change chuck system is a very loose fit. I do not like the Quick Change chuck system at all. The cutters and drill chuck wobble from side to side and move up and down 1/8 inch. I believe the drill would be good if they used two set screws like most other mag drills to retain the 3/4 inch Weldon Shank cutters.
customer_reviews.author: fit1985

customer_reviews.title: For the price of this drill.you cant beat it
customer_reviews.text: The drill works great.I like that comes in a storage case.easy to keep all parts in one place. There is a little play in the drill press mechanism That you have to adjust if you are drilling broken Bolts out and you need to be dead center. For the quality of this product you can't beat the price. Very happy with this drill kit.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Cote

customer_reviews.title: Works, less $ than others, good features
customer_reviews.text: It works. At least as well as any other mag drill, even the pricier ones. 2 speed is nice, mag holds fine, plenty of power, the included Jacob's chuck is cool, quick change bit holder is much faster than set screws. Only downside is the slop in the quick change collet. It does flop around quite a lot, especially in horizontal drilling. I haven't used the coolant system yet
customer_reviews.author: Chad T.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t search just buy it is the best
customer_reviews.text: I am a welder fabricator do you wanna listen to me don’t waste your time and buy very expensive one This the dewalt is amazing and the best
customer_reviews.author: Mohanad

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Wish the buttons were designed a little different, it's easy to press the wrong one when there away from you.
customer_reviews.author: Cisco A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for use to drill on truck frame
customer_reviews.text: I m impressed how this drill do the job.. Works great
customer_reviews.author: papi

customer_reviews.title: Save your back when drilling truck frames etc.
customer_reviews.text: Nice tool at a surprisingly reasonable price. Anyone who modifies or repairs heavy trucks knows how much trouble if is to drill multiple holes through a frame to locate spring mounts and fifth-wheel plates etc. My last project involved drilling multiple 3/4" holes in a dump bed to install the new rubber mounted LED clearance lights. The time I saved drilling those 16 holes with this tool practically paid for it. Wish this affordable unit was available 30 years ago. I could have saved my back a lot of grief!
customer_reviews.author: PlaneOldStuff

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, easy to use. It includes storage box and accessories that some of the other brands did not. A good value .
customer_reviews.author: Mike A.

customer_reviews.title: Supper product!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what we needed, this mag drill works better than we expected. It was packaged very well plus it came with a very nice case. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Hauling Express Inc

customer_reviews.title: this dewalt cut 2 inch holes like butter at 1/2 the price of the other brand
customer_reviews.text: after buying a brand that was highly known and returning (2)...... this dewalt cut 2 inch holes like butter at 1/2 the price of the other brand....wow
customer_reviews.author: c. callas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool
customer_reviews.text: Product works as good as it should the only complaint is the oil drip device does not function very well all in all do you want quality comes through once again
customer_reviews.author: Russell  Chipman

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty drill
customer_reviews.text: We used this drill on a frame for a semi. It worked great
customer_reviews.author: ghay

customer_reviews.title: This one works when you plug it in! Unlike the off brand model!
customer_reviews.text: Quality and options are great! Worth spending the extra money! Don’t waste your time with off brand low quality units to save a couple bucks! Do your research!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth W Ley

customer_reviews.title: Drilled it like a hot knife in
customer_reviews.text: Third film is a beast. Had to cut a 1" diameter hole in a 1-1/4" thick peice or hardened steel. Drilled it like a hot knife in butter
customer_reviews.author: Steven Hassett

customer_reviews.title: A Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This product was a gift. It was a desire and wanted product so I am very pleased that it is being enjoyed with love.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: another home run from dewalt
customer_reviews.text: used for machining welds on excavator boom for bushing replacement. very tight smooth drill couldnt be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great drill
customer_reviews.text: I own a fab shop and we have 6 mag drills . This works as good as the rest but love the quick change chuck. Buy it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Probably the nicest mag drill I ever used. Variable speed, and instead of having to unscrew the handles it has a button that releases to switch sides.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Mag on the market
customer_reviews.text: Put this machine through it’s paces and it did NOT disappoint. Would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This Frame Drill or Magnetic Drill really does do a great job! No Complaints
customer_reviews.author: Brad Welton

customer_reviews.title: Blows Milwaukee Out of the water.
customer_reviews.text: Super badass drill, magnet is the strongest I've used yet. Variable speed comes in super handy!
customer_reviews.author: Jeromie H.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great for a budget mag drill. 2 spd is a must have. chuck can wobble a tiny bit. but just center punch your hole and it will start straight.
customer_reviews.author: 379xhd

customer_reviews.title: Works like it should
customer_reviews.text: Cuts like a hot knife in butter. Great lube system.
customer_reviews.author: Sully's L.

customer_reviews.title: DeWalt mag base drill
customer_reviews.text: Went with the DeWalt mag drill as it was the best balance of capacity and cost. It was purchased knowing that it was going to be a occasionally used tool, but a needed one. Thus far it has preformed well, making those tasks its suited for much easier. I am happy with its performance and having bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Mario M.

customer_reviews.title: drill worked very well
customer_reviews.text: no complaints about drill, but the chuck adapter broke on second hole
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool. Very,very strong magnet. Quick disconnect chuck is the way to go! Make sure to drill pilot hole and use lubricant.
customer_reviews.author: andy wojcik

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Outstandingly happy with this purchase. A lot of bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: john Neumann

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt DWE1622K Nice Design, Nice Features - Poor Results
customer_reviews.text: Drill seems well built but the run-out at the chuck is easy to see and unacceptable. The shaft above the Weldon chuck has 0 run-out. The Weldon chuck uses ball bearings and a slip yoke to hold the annular cutters. This causes them to wobble in the shaft causing excessive run-out. If you holes don't have to be precise this drill will work fine. The attached video shows the chuck run-out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This drill press is awesome, magnetic drills use to cost thousands now Dewalt has this one for under a thousand, GREAT deal. Used it on 1/4" and 3/8" thick angle and tube, worked perfectly, highly recommend if you have the application. Magnets are very strong and will hold it on place with no issue.
customer_reviews.author: JLehmann

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far it has worked very well. I have no regrets in the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: grant b coulter

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well built and easy to set up. It meet all my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: Great tool, makes drilling the correct hole the first much easier with no walking
customer_reviews.author: Eric Scales

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great Product!!! This made my life much easier! I certainly recommend this drill press. I ordered another one for our shop!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it works very good .
customer_reviews.text: the drill works very well. and it is easy to handle. It nice to set up and drills smoothly thank you .
customer_reviews.author: Harvey Oswald

product_meta.title: DEWALT Drill Press, 2-Speed, Magnetic, 2-Inch (DWE1622K)
product_meta.description: Style:Drill PressThe DEWALT DWE1622K 2" 2-Speed Magnetic Drill Press features a 10 amp motor with 2-speed settings that provide optimal performance in a variety of applications. This press has overload protection electronics which prevent motor damage and excess accessory wear designed for long life. A Quick Change chuck system allows for tool free change between 3/4" Weldon Shank and 1/2" keyed chuck, and the Quick Release feed handles provide tool free change of handles to either side of the tool. The magnetic self feed cooling tank allows the user to regulate the flow of cooling fluid and can be placed on either side of tool or on a work surface to allow for a variety of tool orientations. 4" Drill travel offers maximum capacity for heavy duty applications, along with a motor height adjustment that gives greater range of accessory compatibility. Includes: DWE1622 Drill Press, Safety chain, and Height adjustment tool, Quick change 1/2-in keyed chuck, Kit box
feature_bullets: 10 amp motor, 2-speed settingsl ;No Load Speed : 300/450 rpm
Overload protection electronics which prevent motor damage
Magnetic coolant bottle can be placed on either side of tool or on a work surface
4-3/8 inch Drill travel offers maximum capacity for heavy duty applications
Quick Change chuck system. Drillpoint Pressure @ 1/2" Steel Plate (12mm) : 741 pounds

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars130 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
